info.name: P2P Rest API
info.description:
Tunki Ux Microservice for P2P

Contact Support:
 Name: Tunki User Team
 Email: developers@indigital.pe

header.description: Identificador del cobro
(Required) Identificador del dispositivo que consume el servicio
